name: Fake Hostel
description:
ALL CHARACTERS ARE 18 YEARS OLD

Fake Hostel this is exciting, puzzle game with Fancy Girls.
Control your tube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery

Fake Hostel contain a nice mechanic, cute girls and awesome story.

Game Features:
  • Intellectual game
  • Cute Different Girls
  • Gallery with animations
  • A lot of beauty
  • Awesome animations
  • Interesting plot
